channel.title: Comments on: A Post-Logue to #DatPostmil? Blog Posts

item.title: By: Clyde Pilgrim
item.dc:creator: Clyde Pilgrim
item.description:
The new or revised Postmillenists cannot escape, at the minimum, a future partial millenial golden age, before the second physical coming of Christ, that is different in kind not just degree, from their first phase of the millenium, to date.
But there is an elephant, or rather a wolf in sheep's clothing, in the room of "Christindoom", the papal kingdom of the Antichrist.
item.content:encoded:
The new or revised Postmillenists cannot escape, at the minimum, a future partial millenial golden age, before the second physical coming of Christ, that is different in kind not just degree, from their first phase of the millenium, to date.

But there is an elephant, or rather a wolf in sheep’s clothing, in the room of “Christindoom”, the papal kingdom of the Antichrist.
